Product Specialist ( Medical Devices ) - Saudi Nationals - RiyadhDescription:Promoting and selling company’s products to new and existing customers by visiting them regularly and constantly. Product Specialist tasks also involve performing certain after-sales support functions such as conducting In-Service Training, follow up on the collection and maintain a good relationship with customers.Job Responsibilities:Perform consultative method of sales with prospecting clients in either identifying or even creating the need for Imdad products and continuously update all customers on company product modifications, changes, and enhancements
Schedule appointments, meet existing and new customers in order to promote Imdad’s product, and to determine other opportunities
Generate and develop new client’s business accounts
Perform professional demonstrations/presentations of company products or services while on customer’s site. Apply successful negotiation and sales closure techniques
Provide adequate information about a new prospect and client, in terms of ownership, working physicians, relevant client’s equipment, and status, and update customer’s database with proper contact details, email, and contact numbers
Submit reports for sales and marketing on a weekly basis in a timely manner
Assist in following up the accounts receivables for sales accounts responsible for
Maintain excellent customer relationship with key decision makers, doctors, key customer’s personnel and always work toward enhancing such relations
Effective use of company’s sales aids and marketing data to secure deals
Effectively attending conferences and workshops
Perform professional in-service training for customer’s end users on systems application
Possess market awareness, competitor’s activities/events and competitor’s pricing changes.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Biomedical Engineering, Pharmaceutical Science or any scientific related degree.
Fresh graduate or up to 4 years’ experience in sales.
Saudi national
KSA Driving License + car
Effective time management, organization and multi-tasking skills
Excellent interpersonal skills
Strong verbal & written communication skills
Team player with ability to work at pace and juggle multiple tasks
Proficient in Microsoft office Applications
